metrics_conclusion: Volatile Reaction has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion:
Volatile Reaction is written in the key of B Locrian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most popular key among Locrian keys and     the 73rd most popular  among all keys. The B Locrian scale is similar to the B Minor scale except that both the 2nd and the 5th notes (C and F) are a half step lower.  This means that the characteristic "home base" chord of B Locrian has a dissonant diminished quality (bËš), which makes it a very uncommon choice for songs.

See the B Locrian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
